name: Defense
flavor: How much of a beating can you really take?
text: You Physical Defense is `Vitality / 2`.\nYour Special Defense is `Insight / 2`.\nMinimum damage is always 1, unless you resist the attack's type - this is the only case where it gets reduced to 0.
example: With 4 points in Vitality and 5 points in Insight, you'd get 2 physical and 3 special defense!
